sn32.3-12:3.1: 3–12 Ten Discourses On How Giving Helps to Become a Cool Cloud God
sn32.3-12:4.2: Seated to one side, that mendicant said to the Buddha:
sn32.3-12:4.3: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the gods of cool clouds?”
sn32.3-12:4.4: “Mendicant, it’s when someone does good things by way of body, speech, and mind.
sn32.3-12:4.6: ‘The gods of cool clouds are long-lived, beautiful, and very happy.’
sn32.3-12:4.8: ‘If only, when my body breaks up, after death, I would be reborn in the company of the cool clouds!’
sn32.3-12:4.11: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of the gods of cool clouds.
sn32.3-12:4.12: This is the cause, this is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the gods of cool clouds.”
